question: The height of a governor is distance measure from
The arms of porter governor are 200mm long. The load on the sleeve is 240N and weight of each ball is 30N. Radius of rotation of the balls is 125mm. Determine the speed of the governor.
From the simulator, at 160rpm what is the approximate height of the governor?
If height of the governor increases speed
The height of a governor is distance measure from

answers.a: the centre of two balls mass
answers.b: the centre of balls mass to the point of intersection of upper arms
answers.c: the centre of balls mass to the point of intersection of lower links
answers.d: the point of intersection of upper arms to the point of intersection of lower links
